extends Object

    rafa

    • Constructor Detail

      • EbeyeConfig

        public EbeyeConfig()
        Simple constructor. The search fields for each EB-Eye domain are set initially to the default values in the Domains enumeration.

      • setMaxAccessionsInQuery

        public void setMaxAccessionsInQuery(int i)
        Description copied from interface: EbeyeConfigMBean
        Sets the maximum number of accessions to be included in the same query sent to EB-Eye. It should not exceed 400.
        Specified by:
        setMaxAccessionsInQuery in interface EbeyeConfigMBean
        Parameters:
        i - the maximum number of accessions to be included in one query.

      • setSearchFields

        public void setSearchFields(String domain,
                   String fields)
        Sets the fields to be searched for a concrete EB-Eye domain.
        Specified by:
        setSearchFields in interface EbeyeConfigMBean
        Parameters:
        domain - the searched domain.
        fields - the fields to which the search should be restricted. A null or empty value means "search all fields". A space-or-colon-or-semicolon separated list of field name.
